Map Contains A Older Tag Name

Since:
Last Modified: $Date: 2004/04/19 15:52:45 $

Test Steps:

  1. Select one project release it as tag1
  2. Release it again with tag2
  3. Change the project's local tag in the map file to tag1
  4. Save the map file
  5. Right click the map file having the entry
  6. Click Team->Load Map Projects

Expected Results:

  1. A dialog popped out to remind that the project exists locally
  2. The local project will be overwritten by the version tagged with tag1 if answer "Yes"
  3. The local project will have no change if answer "No" file
